name: Bubblefield
description:
Mini Jam 84  Theme: Bubbles  Limitation: You are your own ammo

There are bad bubble in this world... Kill them!

RULES

Bubble has size. Max size is 5 / 5. If 6 / 5 = you are dead. You can shoot part of the bubble. If you hit the bubble, you reduce your size. If you miss, your shots will come back.

CONTROLLS

WASD = Move

Mouse = Control camera

Mouse scroll = Zoom

E = move up

Q = move down

Left mouse button = Shoot part of the bubble
